name: (GGJ 2019) Zombieland: Homesick
description:
Description

It's zombie apocalypse out there. Some fight with the undead to save humankind. Some try to save their life... 

But you have more important things to do. You've made it to the "Rami's" shop. Half of the job is done. Now you GOTTA come back home... Alive!

Game jam theme

"What does home means to you"

Controls

WASD / Arrow keys - Move around

Spacebar - Shoot

Escape - Shutdown the game

Backspace - Restart the game

-------------------------------------------------------

The game also supports the gamepad.
